effect.en: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Tauros is now Confused.
effect.fr: Lancez 3 pièces. Cette attaque inflige 30 dégâts multipliés par le nombre de côtés face. Tauros est maintenant Confus.

description.en: They fight each other by locking horns. The herd’s protector takes pride in its battle-scarred horns.
